ingredients.item: 350g pack Waitrose Diced Butternut & Sweet Potato
350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato And Basil Sauce

instructions.step: Cook the diced vegetables in a saucepan of boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain and return to the pan.

Add the harissa paste and cook for a few minutes, stirring well to coat the veg, then add the tomato sauce, chestnuts, olives and a splash of water. Cover and simmer for 2-3 minutes. 3 Stir in the chopped coriander and serve with a mixed or green salad on the side.
